title: Cannot Leave Lobby, Tried Everything
body:
Hi, i cant leave my aram lobby for some reason, ive tried everything, i even reinstalled lol completely


PLEASE HELP

replies.body: I have the same bug sadly :( I canâ€™t start a game for a few days now, tried uninstalling, tried everything any fixes? Would be great if this is fixed ASAP, thx

Hi folks,

That sucks to hear you're stuck - Did you send in support tickets on this?  If not, please do so we can track it :)

Our tech team is looking into it but no ETA on a fix just yet.

Will update you here if there is more info.

Cheers
Mindstar

its fixed :D
